Hi, I'm Scott Chamberlain

I study the evolution of species interactions, how species interactions
influence evolution of species traits and influence communities, among other things.

I like:

  • Ecology

  • Evolution

  • Mutualism

  • Conditionality in species interactions

  • Meta-analysis
